name: luna-sherpa-multiagent
description: Luna Sherpa Companion â€” introducing MacroFlow ritual with voice, background sync, parallel skills, and seamless grok.com conversation sync. Now with Grok 4.20 multimodal capabilities for video, voice, and build generation.

commands.title: Ask the Team (Research, Logician, Designer)
commands.description: Experience the 4-agent collaborative AI demo - Research, Logician, and Designer agents working together in parallel. Use 'demo' as API key for sample responses.

commands.title: Create AI Build
commands.description: Generate complete software builds using Grok Build capabilities

commands.title: Decompose Task into Artifacts
commands.description: Break down complex requirements into vertical slices and generate concrete artifacts

commands.title: Generate Video
commands.description: Create video content from text descriptions using Grok 4.20

commands.title: Generate Voice
commands.description: Convert text to speech using Grok 4.20's voice synthesis

commands.title: Process Video with AI
commands.description: Analyze video content using Grok 4.20's video processing capabilities

commands.title: Process Voice/Audio
commands.description: Transcribe and analyze audio using Grok 4.20's voice processing

commands.title: Setup Luna Workspace
commands.description: Safely initialize ~/.github or ./.github directory with Luna's latest agent files, skills, and configuration (non-destructive, choose user or workspace level)

lunaSherpa.apiKey.description: Your xAI API key (get at console.x.ai)

lunaSherpa.userAddress.description: How Luna addresses you (e.g., your name or a neutral term like 'sahib')

lunaSherpa.applicationInsightsKey.description: Azure Application Insights instrumentation key for telemetry. Replace with your own key from Azure Portal.

lunaSherpa.grok420Enabled.description: Enable Grok 4.20 features (video, voice, build capabilities)

lunaSherpa.videoEnabled.description: Enable video processing and generation features

lunaSherpa.voiceEnabled.description: Enable voice processing and generation features

lunaSherpa.buildEnabled.description: Enable Grok Build code generation features
